user_query: I'm planning a road trip with my friends and we want to reduce our carbon footprint. Can you calculate the CO2e in Kg from using public transportation for a distance of 1000 km? Additionally, fetch the methane concentration data in the atmosphere for the past month. Also, convert the planet angle '67.34.0' to degree format.

TaskList.description: Calculate the CO2e emissions in Kg from using public transportation for a distance of 1000 km.
Fetch the methane concentration data in the atmosphere for the past month.
Convert the planet angle '67.34.0' to degree format.
